plot: A creative executive at an advertising agency and his girlfriend try to solve the mystery of their friend Icha who seemingly starts to appear at two different places at the same time.
title: Arikil Oraal
plot_es: A creative executive at an advertising agency and his girlfriend try to solve the mystery of their friend Icha who seemingly starts to appear at two different places at the same time.
plot_en: A creative executive at an advertising agency and his girlfriend try to solve the mystery of their friend Icha who seemingly starts to appear at two different places at the same time.
